long_description: Designed to stick to smooth-finished paddleboards or kayaks, the Seattle Sports Lashmates SuperSuk offer temporary lashing points for strapping down gear. Convenient suction cups can be moved as needed by simply lifting the lever to break the suction, then remounted with a quick flip of the lever. Seattle Sports Lashmates SuperSuk are sold as a pair.
short_description: Designed to stick to smooth-finished paddleboards or kayaks, the Seattle Sports Lashmates SuperSuk offer temporary lashing points for strapping down gear.
